articles.description: Priyanka Chopra, 38, has spoken out about married life and how it took a global pandemic for herself and husband Nick Jonas to be able to spend time together in an interview with Marie Claire.
articles.content:
She married husband Nick Jonas in Jodhpur in traditional Hindu and Christian ceremonies back in 2018.
